StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Reads in points from a tipsy binary file.

StringVectorProperty.name: MarkFileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: If set, only particles specified in the marked file are read in.

StringVectorProperty.name: AdditionalAttributeFiles
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Additional attribute files set are merged into existing database.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReadPositionsOnly
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, only the particle's position, not its attributes are read in.
